scripts.cp-share: cp -R fofo-shared fofo-web-ext/src/shared && cp -R fofo-shared fofo-front/src/shared
scripts.build-share: npm run clean && npm run cp-share
scripts.build-web-ext: npm run build-share && cd fofo-web-ext && npm run build
scripts.build-web-ext-prod: npm run build-share && cd fofo-web-ext && npm run build-prod
scripts.start-front: npm run build-share && cd fofo-front && npm run start
